snippet: The rebel group M23 has suspended peace talks with the government of the Democratic Republic of Congo, a rebel spokesman said Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: The rebel group M23 has suspended peace talks with the government of the Democratic Republic of Congo, a rebel spokesman said Wednesday.

headline.seo: Congo: Rebel Group Suspends Peace Talks
headline.main: Congo: Rebel Group Suspends Peace Talks
headline.print_headline: Congo: Rebel Group Suspends Peace Talks
